name: Jim 'n' Jimmy's SLOTTERHOUSE
description:
WELCOooOME TO JIM 'N' JIMMY'S SLOTTERHOUSE! The lucky game of chance where you hope to God that the Slot Machine grants you some decent abilities! Will it give you a Shotgun? Will it give you a Grappling Hook? Or will it simply take away your fundamental ability to look around or even walk?! Only the slot machine knows! So give us your money and take a spin at JIM 'N' JIMMY'S SLOTTERHOUSE! 

How to Play: - There are 3 floors to the Slotterhouse: Arcade Floor, Maze Floor, and Roulette Floor.
- On each floor, there are 4 enemy waves that you must survive!
- Watch out! Every now and then, your entire loadout is scrambled by the Slot Machine, and you must adapt to new weapons (Shotgun, Raygun, Chaingun, and Hammer), new abilities (Double Jump, Dash, and Grappling-Hook. Yes, you heard me), and curses (No movement, no jumping, and no looking around!!).
- You'll have to adapt your playstyle to these dramatic shifts... Can't move or jump? Use the intense recoil of your gun to slide around and scale platforms! Can't look around? Good luck! The odds are stacked against you in JIM 'N' JIMMY'S SLOTTERHOUSE! Controls: Walk:                          WASD
Shoot:                         Left Click
Jump/Dbl. Jump: Space
Dash:                           Shift
Grappling Hook:  Control
